[[inst_hl_swi]]
==== HL.SWI

*Syntax:* hl.swi SrcD, [SrcR, simm]

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_swi.svg[HL.SWI encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/LONG
